author: newsr.in
title: With love from Bollywood: SRK gifts set of films to Paulo Coelho - newsR
text:
From the historical drama 'Asoka' to the field of hockey in 'Chak De! India', Bollywood's 'Badshah' Shah Rukh Khan sent across a collection of his films to Paulo Coelho to introduce the celebrated author to the world of Hindi films.*Shah Rukh Khan. Pic/PTI*
The author, who has written several books such as 'The Alchemist', ... Â»
